name: Choshi by Luxury Cigars - Robusto
additionalNotes: Artesano Del Tobacco, recognized for its Viva La Vida brand, has been associated with Luxury Cigar Club since its inception. Choshi, a joint creation of Billy and Gus, is the second blend from Artesano Del Tobacco launched to market and the first available exclusively through Luxury Cigar Club. This premium cigar, with a complex and balanced flavor profile, represents the collaboration and passion of both creators. Despite delays due to the pandemic and challenges in the supply chain, Choshi is finally ready to delight cigar lovers.
